original_text: Yes, cause all the proud people to be humble. Knock down wicked people to the ground. Yes, cause all the proud people to be humble.
korean_text: 모든 교만한 자를 발견하여 낮아지게 하며 악인을 그들의 처소에서 짓밟을지니라

sentences.original_text: Yes, cause all the proud people to be humble.
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 모든 교만한 사람을 겸손하게 하십시오.

sentences.original_text: Knock down wicked people to the ground.
Yes, cause all the proud people to be humble.
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 모든 교만한 사람을 겸손하게 하십시오.
